entries.name: new(hash=nil)
entries.desc: Creates a new OpenStruct object.  By default, the resulting OpenStruct object will have no attributes.

entries.name: ==(other)
entries.desc: Compares this object and other for equality.  An OpenStruct is equal to other when other is an OpenStruct and the two objects' Hash tables are equal.

entries.name: ostruct[name]  → objectclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns the value of an attribute.

entries.name: ostruct[name] = obj  → objclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Sets the value of an attribute.

entries.name: delete_field(name)
entries.desc: Removes the named field from the object. Returns the value that the field contained if it was defined.

entries.name: dig(name, ...)  → objectclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Extracts the nested value specified by the sequence of name objects by calling dig at each step, returning nil if any intermediate step is nil.

entries.name: each_pair {|name, value| block }  → ostructclick to toggle source
eql?(other)
entries.desc: Compares this object and other for equality.  An OpenStruct is eql? to other when other is an OpenStruct and the two objects' Hash tables are eql?.

entries.name: hash()
entries.desc: Computes a hash code for this OpenStruct. Two OpenStruct objects with the same content will have the same hash code (and will compare using eql?).

entries.name: inspect()
entries.desc: Returns a string containing a detailed summary of the keys and values.

entries.name: marshal_dump()
entries.desc: Provides marshalling support for use by the Marshal library.

entries.name: marshal_load(x)
entries.desc: Provides marshalling support for use by the Marshal library.
